Uses of Package
jam.data

Packages that use jam.data
jam Root package for the Jam software package. 
jam.applet Applet classes(?). 
jam.data Contains classes for representing histograms, gate conditions and scalers. 
jam.data.control Dialogs for manipulating histograms, gates, scalers, real-time monitors, and data parameters. 
jam.data.func Specific implementations of CalibrationFunction for giving energy calibrations of one-dimensional histograms. 
jam.io Contains classes for storing histograms and/or gates and scalers to files. 
jam.io.hdf Pure Java implementation to store histograms, gates, and scalers in the HDF 4.1 format. 
jam.plot Classes for controlling the representation of the plots portion of Jam's display. 
 

Classes in jam.data used by jam
DataException
          Exception that can be thrown when unrecoverable error conditions occur in jam.data classes.
Gate
          A gate, used for data sorting, belongs to a histogram which determines what type of gate it is.
Histogram
          Class containing spectra and the routines to perform operations on them.
RemoteData
          Remote interface for getting data from a Jam server process.
 

Classes in jam.data used by jam.applet
Gate
          A gate, used for data sorting, belongs to a histogram which determines what type of gate it is.
 

Classes in jam.data used by jam.data
CalibrationFunction
          A function that can be use to calibrate a histogram.
DataException
          Exception that can be thrown when unrecoverable error conditions occur in jam.data classes.
DataParameter
          Class for user-defined numerical parameters that can be used during sorting.
Gate
          A gate, used for data sorting, belongs to a histogram which determines what type of gate it is.
Histogram
          Class containing spectra and the routines to perform operations on them.
Scaler
          Class representing an individual scaler in the experiment.
 

Classes in jam.data used by jam.data.control
Monitor
          This class is for monitoring the status of data acquisition.
